title: Junior Adventurer Kit
desc: This kit contains printed Coroplast sheets to make two different gliders and balsa glider kits with two levels of difficulty. This is a combo kit for the Aeromodelling Activity. It can be used for initial workshops to create awareness of Aeromodelling.
include: Paper Plane Kit, Coroplast Glider Kit (2 Types), Balsa wood Glider Kit (2 Types)
